intro: Hieracium ussense, commonly known as the lesser hawkweed, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its hairy stems and yellowish to reddish flower heads, which consist of numerous small florets. The plant typically grows in meadows, grasslands, and disturbed soils, preferring temperate climates. Its leaves are lance-shaped and often have a rough texture, while its roots are fibrous and shallow. Hieracium ussense is an herbaceous perennial that blooms from late spring to early autumn.
